Kronologi Amarah Melly Goeslaw soal Pesta Halloween BCL
01 Nov 2019, 10:49 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Kronologis muasal amarah Melly Goeslaw yang mengetahui dirinya menjadi bahan canda di pesta Halloween yang diunggah Kamis (31/10). (Foto: CNN Indonesia/Tri Wahyuni)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Musisi Melly Goeslaw marah karena sosoknya dijadikan kostum pada pesta Halloween oleh make up artis bernama Bubah Alfian. Pesta tersebut digelar oleh penyanyi sekaligus aktris Bunga Citra Lestari. Kemarahan istri Anto Hoed itu berawal ketika penyanyi Vidi Aldiano mengunggah video di fitur Story Instagram. Dalam unggahan yang ditandai pada akun Instagram Melly itu terlihat Vidi dan penyanyi Rossa menertawakan Bubah yang menjadi Melly.Selain Vidi, fashion stylist Bimo Permadi turut mengunggah Story yang juga ditandai pada akun instagram Melly. Terlihat Bubah sedang berjoget sembari direkam yang disambut tawa beberapa orang.Tidak lama setelah unggahan itu, Melly memberikan respons lewat Instagram. Ia mengunggah ulang video Story Vidi di feed Instagram dengan penjelasan panjang."Saya enggak anggap ini bercanda lho, biarpun semalam itu judulnya pesta kostum tetap aja dalam rangka Halloween. Saya bukan hantu woy," penggalan penjelasan Melly.Melly melanjutkan, "Sepele buat kalian tetapi dalam buat saya dan saya enggak suka dan bagus cuma saya taruh di feed. Enggak saya urek-urek itu UU ITE dan pasal perbuatan kurang menyenangkan."Musisi berusia 45 tahun secara tidak langsung menjelaskan ia tidak masalah sosoknya dijadikan kostum asal ditampilkan dengan baik. Ia mencontohkan selebriti Kourtney Kardashian yang menjadi Ariana Grande di Halloween tahun ini.


Ungkapan kemarahan Melly Goeslaw yang kini sudah dihapus. (screenshoot via

Saat ini unggahan tersebut sudah dihapus. Namun ada dua unggahan lain yang nampak berkaitan dengan unggahan terdahulu.






Suami Melly, Anto Hoed, juga mengunggah penjelasan terkait hal tersebut. Ia memulai penjelasan dengan berterima kasih kepada Allah yang telah memberikan wanita baik dan indah lebih dari berlian."Di sisi lain apa yang Allah hadiahkan pada saya, juga menjadi bahan tertawaan yang hebat. Dengan kata lain menertawakan apa yang Allah ciptakan dan hadiahkan pada saya dan anak saya," penggalan penjelasan Anto.






Kemarahan Melly dan Anto diketahui oleh Vidi, Bubah dan Rossa. Ketiganya mengunggah permintaan maaf kepada pasangan musisi tersebut, di mana mereka juga kompak mematikan kolom komentar pada unggahan masing-masing."Kejadian semalam ternyata menyakiti hati. Secara pribadi sudah meminta maaf ke Teh Melly. Bener-bener ga ada intensi untuk menyinggung terlebih menyakiti," penggalan penjelasan Vidi.



"Semalam tanpa saya sadari hal yang saya lakukan menyinggung beliau dan keluarga. Di sini dari dalam lubuk hati saya yang terdalam saya memohon maaf yang sebesar-besarnya kepada Teteh Melly, Anto dan keluarga," penggalan penjelasan Bubah.



"Ada sebuah insiden yang saya sesali, terlebih karena saya tidak sengaja menyakiti perasaan orang saya sayangi, sahabat saya sendiri. Saat saya sadar akan hal itu, saya langsung menemui Teh Melly dan Mas Anto, meminta maaf atas hal yang menyebabkan kesalahpahaman," penggalan penjelasan Rossa.



Sebagai penyelenggara acara, sampai saat ini BCL belum mengeluarkan respons atau penjelasan apa pun terkait permasalahan ini. Bimo Permadi juga terlihat masih bungkam. (adp/rea)

Chronology of Anger Melly Goeslaw about the BCL Halloween Party
01 Nov 2019, 10:49 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


The chronology of the anger of Melly Goeslaw, who knew she was a joke at a Halloween party, was uploaded on Thursday (10/31). (Photo: CNN Indonesia / Tri Wahyuni)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Musician Melly Goeslaw is angry because her figure was made a costume at a Halloween party by a make up artist named Bubah Alfian. The party was held by singer and actress Bunga Citra Lestari. Anto Hoed's wife's anger began when singer Vidi Aldiano uploaded a video on the Instagram Story feature. In the upload marked on Melly's Instagram account, Vidi and singer Rossa laugh at Bubah who became Melly. Besides Vidi, fashion stylist Bimo Permadi also uploaded Story which was also marked on Melly's Instagram account. Bubah was seen dancing while being recorded which was greeted by some people's laughter. Not long after the upload, Melly responded via Instagram. He re-uploaded the Story Vidi video on the Instagram feed with a lengthy explanation: "I don't think this is joking, you know, even though last night the title was just a costume party in Halloween. I'm not a ghost of a woy," snaps Melly's explanation. but in me and I don't like it and it's good that I just put it in the feed. I don't care about the ITE Law and the article about deeds is not pleasant. He cited celebrity Kourtney Kardashian who became Ariana Grande on Halloween this year.


Melly Goeslaw's angry expression which has now been removed. (screenshoot via

At this time the upload has been deleted. However, there are two other uploads that appear to be related to the previous upload.






Melly's husband, Anto Hoed, also uploaded an explanation regarding this matter. He began the explanation by thanking God for giving a good and beautiful woman more than a diamond. "On the other hand what God gave me, also became a great laughing stock. In other words laughing at what God created and presented to me and my child, "a piece of Anto's explanation.






Melly and Anto's anger is known by Vidi, Bubah and Rossa. The three of them uploaded an apology to the couple's musicians, where they also compactly turned off the comments column on their respective uploads. "The incident last night turned out to hurt. Personally, I apologized to Melly Tea. There was really no intention to offend, especially to hurt, "fragment of Vidi's explanation.



"Last night without me realizing what I was doing offended him and his family. Here from the bottom of my heart I apologize profusely to Teteh Melly, Anto and family," fragment of Bubah's explanation.



"There is an incident that I regret, especially because I accidentally hurt the feelings of my loved ones, my own friend. When I was aware of that, I immediately went to Melly Tea and Mas Anto, apologizing for the cause of the misunderstanding," the fragment of explanation Rossa.



As the organizer of the event, to date BCL has not issued any response or explanation regarding this issue. Bimo Permadi was also seen still silent. (adp / rea)
